Package tools.concurrent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Scheduler
    Abstract class for task distribution handlers which can queue and execute tasks.
    SchedulerEventObject
    Data object for notifying events for the scheduler classes.
    SchedulerSet<S extends Scheduler>
    This class provides a fair time-wise distribution over multiple schedulers.
    SelfScheduler
    Most basic implementation of Scheduler.
    ThreadScheduler
    Scheduler implementation using a separate thread to execute the tasks.
    ThreadTimer
    Class which replaces the Timer class.
    TimerTool
    Class which adds extra functionallity to the default Timer class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FPSState
    Enum for how to handle the frame rate for timers.
    SchedulerEvent
    Enum for scheduler observer events.
    ThreadTimer.TimerState
    Enum for denoting the state of the timer.
    TimerTool.TimerState
    Enum for the current state of the timer.
